# Wikimedia open source software

Browse open source software projects from Wikimedia.

# MediaWiki platform

The collaborative editing engine that runs Wikipedia

MediaWiki

The collaborative editing engine that runs Wikipedia

  • Project homepage on mediawiki.org
  • Source code
  • Documentation on mediawiki.org
  • PHP code documentation
  • JavaScript code documentation
  • PHP metrics report

Wikibase

The software suite that powers Wikidata

Read the docs on mediawiki.org
